name: Simulator dalbaeba 2k17
description:
What is this game?We cobined all main trends of 2k17 in our game. You will have to complete simple fast missions to get points and Steam achievements!Missions
  • tap button as fast as you can to exhale the maximum amount of smoke from vape
  • scroll your trackpad at the speed of light to squeeze the maximum out of the spinner
  • try to get the excellent balance and drive to the moon and back on hyroscooter
  • DAB DAB DAB DAB
  • catch as many achievements as you can in achievements fall using your mouse

What do you need to complete this game?Your patience, concentration and some sleight of hand, of course ;)
